subject: Adobe, Macromedia
body:
Without education, you're not going anywhere in this world.

The finest lives in my opinion are the common model, without miracle and without extravagance.

Better to have loved a short man than never to have loved a tall.

The Metropolis should have been aborted long before it became New York, London or Tokyo.

A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.

Intolerance has been the curse of every age and state.

Build bridges instead of walls and you will have a friend.

We fight not to enslave, but to set a country free, and to make room upon the earth for honest men to live in.

Custom, then, is the great guide of human life.

How it infuriates a bigot, when he is forced to drag out his dark convictions!

Where women are concerned, the rule is never to go out with anyone better dressed than you.

He lives who dies to win a lasting name.

The personal appropriation of clichTs is a condition for the spread of cultural tourism.
